title: JLPT-Kanji Quiz
summary:
If you who always search and learn a quiz app like these, this app is for you

1. JLPT Flash card app.
2. JLPT Quiz app.
3. JLPT Minna nihongo app.
4. JLPT N3, N4, N5.
5. JLPT Question app.
6. Guess the Kanji app.

Main Features:
・Breaking up the content of the JLPT: makes practice more interesting and less boring.
・Flashcard for JLPT N3, N4, N5
・Learn by Quiz JLPT N3, N4, N5

title: Solar System Quiz for Japanese
summary:
Easy learning about solar system, stars, celestial objects, constellations, spacecraft with pictures ,sounds and quiz games.

If you who always search and learn a quiz app like these, this app is for you

① Solar system Flash card app.
② Stars Quiz app.
③ Celestial objects quiz app.
④ Star history and information app.
⑤ Constellations name cards.
⑥ Guess solar system app.


Features:
- You can learn many kinds of stars.
- You can play solar system quiz.
- Many information related to solar system, stars, celestial objects, constellations, spacecraft
- Support Quiz feature.

title: Flashcard Japanese beginner
summary:
Flashcards is an easy to use flashcard app which you can use to start study Japanese

Features:

• Several flashcard themes to choose from (animals, tree, fruits, etc.)
• Divide cards into categories
• Include pictures and sounds.
• Easy navigation - swipe or tap to next/back
• Very easy to get started
• Great support! I promptly respond to any questions or feedback you may have. Use my website's public forum or email me.

title: GUESS THE FLAGS - QUIZ
summary:
This GUESS THE FLAGS app have many quiz that show a picture of country flag for you to guess!

If you who always search and play a quiz app like these, this app is for you

1. GUESS THE COUNTRY app.
2. Flashcard for country.
3. Guess the country flag app.
4. Flags quiz.
5. Flags app.
6. Flag guessing app.
7. Guess the capitals.

You will enjoy this GUESS THE FLAGS app and for sure, you will enjoy this flags quiz!

Guess the country if you can!
